title: Mari, Coco y la bolsa de gusanitos
titleTranslation: Mari, Coco and the bag of cheese puffs

thumbnail.generation_prompt: Two elephants, one small and one larger, behind a building, under a tree, grass.

tags.name: Grammar
tags.description: Present tense (ser, estar, tener, ir, gustar), simple sentences, basic connectors

tags.name: Themes
tags.description: Friendship, simple pleasures, a secret spot, sharing

content.text: Mari es una elefanta pequeña y Coco es un elefante.
content.translation: Mari is a little elephant and Coco is an elephant.

content.text: Un día Mari y Coco tienen una bolsa de gusanitos.
content.translation: One day Mari and Coco have a bag of cheese puffs.
detailedTranslation: tienen — they have; tener (tengo, tienes, tiene, tenemos, tenéis, tienen)

content.text: Van detrás del bloque, donde nadie los ve.
content.translation: They go behind the block, where nobody sees them.

content.text: Eligen un sitio a la sombra de un nogal.
content.translation: They choose a spot in the shade of a walnut tree.
detailedTranslation: a la sombra de — in the shade of

highlights.text: a la sombra de un nogal

content.translation: They sit down on the grass.
detailedTranslation: Se sientan — they sit down; sentarse (reflexive)

content.generation_prompt: Two elephants behind a building, under a walnut tree, on grass, a bag between them.

content.text: Los gusanitos les hacen cosquillas en los dedos.
content.translation: The cheese puffs tickle their fingers.
detailedTranslation: les hacen cosquillas — they tickle them (les = to them)

content.translation: For them it is an adventure.

content.generation_prompt: Two elephants sitting on grass eating snacks from a bag, tree shade, content.

content.text: Ese rincón es su pequeño paraíso.
content.translation: That corner is their little paradise.

content.text: Las cosas simples saben muy bien.
detailedTranslation: saben — they taste; saber (here: taste, not know)

content.generation_prompt: Two elephants in a shady corner under a tree, grass, peaceful, happy.

content.text: Mari y Coco están muy contentos.
content.translation: Mari and Coco are very happy.

ser.explanation: Ser: identity, origin. Son = they are.

un día.explanation: Time expression; Un día + present = one day they have...

ir.explanation: Van = they go. Ir: voy, vas, va, vamos, vais, van.

detrás de.explanation: Detrás del bloque = behind the block (building).

sombra.explanation: A la sombra de un nogal = in the shade of a walnut tree.

sentarse.explanation: Reflexive: se sientan = they sit down.

hierba.explanation: En la hierba = on the grass.

abrir.explanation: Abren = they open. Abrir: abro, abres, abre, abrimos, abrís, abren.

gusanitos.explanation: Popular snack in Spain; crunchy sticks.

hacer cosquillas.explanation: Les hacen cosquillas = they tickle them (their fingers).

rincón.explanation: Ese rincón = that corner (their secret spot).

saber bien.explanation: Saber = to taste (food); saben muy bien = they taste very good.

estar contento.explanation: Estar contento/a = to be happy. Están muy contentos = they are very happy.
